title: SJVN to develop pumped storage, floating solar projects in Maharashtra
description: State-owned SJVN has signed two agreements with the Maharashtra government to develop pumped storage and floating solar projects worth Rs 48,000 crore. The projects include five pumped storage facilities totaling 8100 MW and a 505 MW floating solar project at lower Wardha Dam. These initiatives are expected to create around 8,400 jobs.
